content:
Calendar

  • Empirical (No Relations)-

    location-WeH5309 :- attendees = office-hours &

      sponsor = mitchell


      location-WeH5307 :- attendees = office-hours &
      sponsor = mason

  • Empirical (Relations)

    location(Meeting, Room) :- attendees(Meeting, office-hours) &

    sponsor(Meeting, S) &

    office(S, Room).

  • Empirical+Analytic (Relations)

    location(Meeting, Room) :- event-type(Meeting, meeting) &

    scheduled-by(Meeting, Person) &

    office(Person, Room) &

    number-of-attendees(Meeting, N) &

    N <= 2.
